mapper.select: select list_id, sl.site_id, sl.entity_type_id, list_url, list_type, list_priority list_pages_el, list_pages_attr, last_page, max_page, page_param, list_enabled, sl.create_date, s.site_home, s.site_name, et.entity_type, ea.attr_key, ea.attr_type, ea.attr_el, ea.attr_name from (select * from site_lists where list_enabled = 1 limit 0, 1) sl, sites s, site_entity_types et, site_entity_attrs ea where sl.site_id = s.site_id and sl.entity_type_id = et.entity_type_id and sl.entity_type_id = ea.entity_type_id

select sl.min_list_id list_id, sl.site_id, sl2.entity_type_id, sl2.list_url, sl2.list_type, sl2.list_priority, sl2.list_pages_el, sl2.list_pages_attr, sl2.last_page, sl2.max_page, sl2.page_param, sl2.list_enabled, sl2.create_date, s.site_home, s.site_name, et.entity_type, ea.attr_key, ea.attr_type, ea.attr_el, ea.attr_name from (select site_id, min(list_id) min_list_id from site_lists where list_enabled = 1 group by site_id) sl, site_lists sl2, sites s, site_entity_types et, site_entity_attrs ea where sl.min_list_id = sl2.list_id and sl.site_id = s.site_id and sl2.entity_type_id = et.entity_type_id and sl2.entity_type_id = ea.entity_type_id

select list_id, sl.site_id, sl.entity_type_id, list_url, list_type, list_priority, list_pages_el, list_pages_attr, last_page, max_page, page_param, list_enabled, sl.create_date, s.site_home, s.site_name, et.entity_type, ea.attr_key, ea.attr_type, ea.attr_el, ea.attr_name from site_lists sl, sites s, site_entity_types et, site_entity_attrs ea where sl.list_enabled = 1 and sl.site_id = s.site_id and sl.entity_type_id = et.entity_type_id and sl.entity_type_id = ea.entity_type_id order by site_id asc, list_priority asc, entity_type_id asc, list_id asc
select list_enabled from site_lists where list_id = #{listId}
